```py
scipy.fft.rfftn(x, s=None, axes=None, norm=None, overwrite_x=False, workers=None, *, plan=None)
```

```py
>>> import scipy.fft
>>> import numpy as np
>>> x = np.ones((2, 2, 2))
>>> scipy.fft.rfftn(x)
array([[[8.+0.j,  0.+0.j], # may vary
 [0.+0.j,  0.+0.j]],
 [[0.+0.j,  0.+0.j],
 [0.+0.j,  0.+0.j]]]) 
```
